metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24489 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description: Incomplete cleanup in some Intel(R) VT-d products may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access. It was discovered that some Intel processors may not properly invalidate cache entries used by Intel Virtualization Technology for Directed I/O (VT-d). This may allow a local user to perform a privilege escalation attack.

notes.Note: sbeattie> INTEL-TA-00442 does not appear to be kernel/qemu aspect to this issue

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
